pages.text: "A not so simple way to return to the Overworld."$(br2)While traveling around the world of the End, you can come across ancient ruins.
There is a destroyed (or not) frame of  $(bold)Runed Flavolite$() and 6 pedestals around it.
These are the remains of the majestic portals that once linked the worlds of the End and Overworld.$(br2)To activate the portal you need to recover frame (if it's broken).
After you'll place the last crystal, portal will be activated.
$(bold)Runed Flavolite$() (to recover the frame) and $(bold)Eternal Crystals$() can be obtained by $(l:rituals/infusion_ritual)Infusion Ritual$(/l).
